other_tests.findings: The appendix is enlarged, measuring 10 mm with trace surrounding fat stranding and fascial thickening. Oral contrast does not fill the appendix. Polypoid thickening is noted at the appendiceal origin bulging into the cecum. The appendix measured approximately 6 mm on prior imaging. There is apparent edema at the cecal origin of the appendix. Exophytic uterine fibroids are noted. A linear hyperdense lesion in the proximal right vastus lateralis is stable. There is disc space narrowing at L2-3 with endplate sclerosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The appendix measured approximately 6 mm on prior imaging and is now enlarged to 10 mm. A linear hyperdense lesion in the proximal right vastus lateralis is noted to be stable.
